name: bu-bulma-css
description: Build custom BulmaCSS file with prefix name to all classes.

scripts.css-build-dev: sass --no-source-map sass/my-bulma.scss build/my-bulma.css && postcss --output css/bu-bulma.css build/my-bulma.css
scripts.css-build: npm run css-build-dev && npm run css-build-min && cp -rfv css/* ../wordpress/wp-content/plugins/unicop-services/admin/css
